title: The Name of the Wind
plot: The novel traces the childhood and education of Kvothe, a legendary magician, musician, and adventurer.

characters.name: Kvothe
characters.description: A gifted young man who becomes a legendary arcanist.

characters.name: Denna
characters.description: A mysterious woman Kvothe pursues.

title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
plot: In a world ruled by the immortal Lord Ruler, a street urchin discovers she has the powers of a Mistborn and joins a crew planning to overthrow the empire.

characters.name: Vin
characters.description: A street thief who discovers she is a Mistborn.

characters.name: Kelsier
characters.description: A charismatic leader planning rebellion.

title: A Game of Thrones

series.name: A Song of Ice and Fire

plot: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne while dark forces gather beyond the Wall.

characters.name: Eddard Stark
characters.description: Lord of Winterfell, drawn into political intrigue.

characters.name: Daenerys Targaryen
characters.description: Exiled princess seeking to reclaim her throne.

title: The Hobbit

awards: New York Herald Tribune Children's Spring Book Festival prize

plot: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is reluctantly swept into a quest to reclaim a lost Dwarf kingdom from the dragon Smaug.

characters.name: Bilbo Baggins
characters.description: A reluctant adventurer.

characters.name: Gandalf
characters.description: A wizard who pushes Bilbo into adventure.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
plot: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts, a school of magic, where he makes friends and enemies while uncovering dark secrets.

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: The boy who lived.

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Intelligent and resourceful student.

title: The Lies of Locke Lamora
plot: A band of con artists, led by Locke Lamora, swindle the rich in the city of Camorr, but soon find themselves entangled in a deadly power struggle.

characters.name: Locke Lamora
characters.description: A master con artist with a brilliant mind.

characters.name: Jean Tannen
characters.description: Locke's loyal and formidable friend.

title: The Way of Kings
plot: In a world wracked by magical storms, a soldier, a scholar, and a slave become pivotal in an impending war for survival.

characters.name: Kaladin
characters.description: A former soldier turned slave with a gift for leadership.

characters.name: Shallan Davar
characters.description: An ambitious young woman seeking knowledge of ancient secrets.

title: The Priory of the Orange Tree
plot: A sprawling epic where a divided world faces the return of a fire-breathing dragon, and powerful women fight to unite kingdoms.

characters.name: Ead Duryan
characters.description: A mage tasked with protecting her queen.

characters.name: Queen Sabran IX
characters.description: A queen pressured to produce an heir.

title: Circe
plot: A retelling of the story of Circe, daughter of Helios, as she carves out a place for herself among gods and mortals.

characters.name: Circe
characters.description: A witch who defies the gods and embraces her independence.

characters.name: Odysseus
characters.description: The Greek hero who visits Circe’s island.

title: Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell
plot: In an alternate 19th-century England, two magicians rise to prominence, rekindling English magic while clashing in ideology and practice.

characters.name: Mr. Norrell
characters.description: A reclusive scholar reviving English magic.

characters.name: Jonathan Strange
characters.description: A bold, intuitive magician who becomes Norrell's rival.

title: American Gods
plot: A man named Shadow is released from prison and becomes embroiled in a conflict between old gods and new in modern America.

characters.name: Shadow Moon
characters.description: An ex-convict caught in the battle of gods.

characters.name: Mr. Wednesday
characters.description: A mysterious conman who is more than he appears.

title: The Blade Itself
plot: A barbarian, a torturer, and a self-absorbed nobleman find themselves on a path toward war and upheaval in a brutal fantasy world.

characters.name: Logen Ninefingers
characters.description: A battle-hardened barbarian seeking survival.

characters.name: Sand dan Glokta
characters.description: A crippled torturer working for the Inquisition.

title: The Black Prism
plot: In a world where magic is harnessed through light and color, the world's most powerful man discovers a dangerous secret that could shatter the balance.

characters.name: Gavin Guile
characters.description: The Prism, the most powerful man alive.

characters.name: Kip
characters.description: A young man who discovers his own magical abilities.

title: Good Omens
plot: An angel and a demon team up to prevent the apocalypse, as they’ve grown fond of Earth and its inhabitants.

characters.name: Aziraphale
characters.description: A fussy but kind-hearted angel.

characters.name: Crowley
characters.description: A demon with a love for earthly pleasures.

title: The Once and Future King
plot: A modern retelling of the legend of King Arthur, tracing his life from boyhood to his tragic downfall.

characters.name: Arthur (Wart)
characters.description: A boy destined to be king.

characters.name: Merlin
characters.description: The wise wizard guiding Arthur.

title: Eragon
plot: A young farm boy discovers a dragon egg, leading him on a journey to become a Dragon Rider and fight an evil empire.

characters.name: Eragon
characters.description: Farm boy turned Dragon Rider.

characters.name: Saphira
characters.description: A dragon bonded with Eragon.

title: Red Rising
plot: Darrow, a lowborn Red miner on Mars, infiltrates the ruling Gold caste to bring justice and spark a revolution.

characters.name: Darrow
characters.description: A miner who rises to challenge the oppressive Golds.

characters.name: Mustang
characters.description: A clever and ambitious Gold woman who joins Darrow.

title: The Magicians
plot: Quentin Coldwater, a high school senior, discovers that magic is real and attends Brakebills, a college for magicians.

characters.name: Quentin Coldwater
characters.description: A gifted but troubled magician.

characters.name: Alice Quinn
characters.description: A talented magician and Quentin's love interest.

title: Dracula
plot: The tale of Count Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England, opposed by Professor Van Helsing and his allies.

characters.name: Count Dracula
characters.description: Vampire lord from Transylvania.

characters.name: Van Helsing
characters.description: Doctor and vampire hunter leading the fight against Dracula.

title: The Alchemist
plot: The journey of a young Andalusian shepherd named Santiago who dreams of finding treasure in Egypt, but discovers deeper truths.

characters.name: Santiago
characters.description: Shepherd boy on a journey of discovery.

characters.name: The Alchemist
characters.description: A wise figure guiding Santiago to his personal legend.

title: Jane Eyre
plot: The story of an orphaned girl who becomes a governess and falls in love with her employer, only to discover his dark secret.

characters.name: Jane Eyre
characters.description: An orphaned girl who becomes a governess.

characters.name: Mr. Rochester
characters.description: Jane's employer with a dark past.

title: Dune
plot: On the desert planet Arrakis, young Paul Atreides rises to power among the Fremen while opposing interstellar political forces.

characters.name: Paul Atreides
characters.description: Heir of House Atreides, destined to become the Kwisatz Haderach.

characters.name: Baron Harkonnen
characters.description: Ruthless ruler seeking control of Arrakis.
